page.title: 20CHICHESTER-1985
page.content: The people who live in this mainly residential area feel that Chichester is a good place to live and are happy here. Many work within Chichester, providing the manpower for the county services while large numbers commute to Portsmouth & other areas. There is a large retired population who are attracted by the amenities of the area. Tourists come to see this old cathedral city and make it their base for visiting the area. Most people like Chichester as it is,but their one common complaint is car parking-a real problem within the confines of so small a city. Over all most people are happy living here _ a city where past and present meet and merge so happily. ************************************** { THIS ENTRY WAS COMPILED BY { THE 4TH YEAR JUNIOR CLASS 1984-85 AT, {JESSIE YOUNGHUSBAND SCHOOL, CHICHESTER
